title: Diff. eq. slope field tang line part - a

content.description: Consider the differential equation dy/dx=−xy2/2 . Let  y = f(x) be the particular solution to this differential equation with the initial condition f(-1)=2.
content.question: On the axes provided, sketch a slope field for the given differential equation at the twelve points indicated.

frqParts.text: On the axes provided, sketch a slope field for the given differential equation at the twelve points indicated.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
